title: Full stack Developer
description: At Coinvise, my primary responsibility is developing an AI agent and an AI framework SDK. This AI agent is equipped with multiple tools, enabling functionalities such as token deployment and listing, NFT creation, campaign management, Web3 interaction, and more. Additionally, the framework supports the integration of custom tools to cater to enterprise-specific requirements.

title: Blockchain Developer
description: At Lamprostech, I worked as a Blockchain and Smart Contract Developer, gaining hands-on experience in building decentralized solutions. I took part in several hackathons (both online and offline), won a few, and worked on some exciting and innovative blockchain projects. My role involved designing, testing, and deploying secure smart contracts while staying updated on the latest trends in the blockchain space.

title: React Native Intern
description: worked as an intern at codelytical where I tried to build a Ecommerce mobile application, there I learned React Native, front-end and Redux.
